short_summary: Real Property Management & FacilitiesModernization Directorate requires an external Project Monitor to support their construction projects at the David Florida Laboratory (DFL).
description: The Real Property Management & Facilities Modernization Directorate at the Canadian SpaceAgency (CSA) requires the services of an external Project Monitor to provide assistance with the oversight of various construction and maintenance activities. The Project Monitor would be expected to monitor the day-today operations of the construction site and support a secure work environment for all projects. The Project Monitor must ensure quality control, coordinate sub-contractors, and track budget expenditures as per CSA-DFL policies and procedures.
full_summary:
===============

**Project Monitor at the David Florida Laboratory**

**Notification**

*   **Reference Number**: cb-713-68821510
*   **Amendment Number**: 6
*   **Solicitation Number**: 9F023-20230223
*   **Publication Date**: 2023-12-06
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-21

**Request for Proposal**

The Canadian Space Agency, specifically the Real Property Management & Facilities Modernization Directorate at the David Florida Laboratory, requires the services of a Project Monitor to oversee various construction and maintenance activities.

**Key Responsibilities**

*   Monitor day-to-day construction site operations
*   Coordinate sub-contractors and track budget expenditures
*   Ensure quality control and provide a secure work environment

**Eligibility**

This tender is open only to Supply Arrangement Holders under E60ZT-18TSPS, who have achieved a Tier 1 rating and are classified under the consultant category of 3.9 Project Monitor – Intermediate.

**Requirements**

*   Expertise in project management and construction coordination
*   Familiarity with CSA-DFL policies and procedures
